features: 👍 Upgraded with Volume Control. Compare with the previous version, The Newer USB Computer Speaker is boasting 3 volume control buttons, including Volume+/ Volume-/ Mute, which is very convenient.
🔊 Upgraded to 8W Powerful Output. The USB Speaker is built in dual 4W High-Sensitive Internal Magnetic Driver, ensures louder volume, greater dynamic range, richer bass and lower distortion.
🔌 One Cable for Both Audio & Power. No need for driver software, No need for 3.5mm AUX cables. Just plug-n-play, very easy to use.

💻 Good System Compatibility. Desktop Computer Speaker is compatible with Windows, macOS and Chrome OS laptops and desktop computers, as long as they had installed the latest audio driver for their sound card.

💻 Broad Hardware Compatibility. The External Laptop Speaker can work great with various brands of PCs, such as Apple MacBook, Lenovo, ThinkPad, HP, Samsung, ASUS, Dell, Acer, LG, Google Chromebook, Microsoft Surface or more.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: [6W] USB Computer Speaker [8W] USB Computer Speaker [10W] USB Computer Speaker Speaker Power 6W (2*3W) 8W (2*4W) 10W (2*5W) Driver Size φ40mm φ45mm φ50mm Driver Type Hi-Magnetic Drivers Hi-Sensitive Drivers Hi-Fidelity Drivers Frequency Response 100Hz - 20kHz 100Hz - 20kHz 100Hz - 20kHz Bass Enhancement Passive Radiator Passive Radiator Dual Inverted Bass Port Volume Control x Buttons Volume Knob RGB Light x x ✓ Product Dimension 7.2 x 2.0 x 1.4 inch 7.2 x 2.2 x 1.8 inch 11 x 2.5 x 2.3 inch Product Weight 0.6 lb 0.8 lb 1.2 lb

[Newer] USB Computer Speakers for Desktop, Laptop, PC Key Features - Upgraded with volume control button. - Built-in dual 4W high-sensitive drivers for full range audio. - Enhanced Bass with passive radiator. - Compatible with all Windows (7/8/10/11) PCs. - Compatible with some macOS & Chrome OS laptops. - Plug and Play, very easy to use. Package List 1 x USB Computer Speaker 1 x User Manual
Upgraded to 8W Powerful Output Built in dual 4W High-Sensitive Drivers and Bass-Enhanced Passive Radiator, ensures louder volume, greater dynamic range, richer bass and lower distortion.
Good System Compatibility The PC Speaker is compatible with Windows/macOS/ChromeOS/Linux laptop, PC and desktop computer.

Broad Hardware Compatibility This Laptop Speaker can work great for various brands of PCs, such as Apple Mac mini, Lenovo, ThinkPad, HP, Samsung, ASUS, Dell, Acer, LG, Google Chromebook, Microsoft Surface or more. NOTE: This speaker can only be used for computers, please DO NOT plug it into TV, TV-Box, Projector, Xbox or Play Station for use.
USB Plug-N-Play No need for driver software, No need for 3.5mm AUX cables. Just Plug and Play, very easy to use.

Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ) Q: Is it compatible with Android TX-Box, TV, Projector, Monitor, Xbox, PStation, iPad or tablets? A: No. This USB speaker can only be used for computers. Because the USB ports of those devices do not have enough power to drive our speaker, which may result in not loud enough maximum volume. Q: Can I plug it into USB-Hub? A: Not recommended. The USB-hub has no enough power to drive our speaker, which may result-in cluttered, distorted or even constantly pops (audio cut-out) at high volume. Q: The volume is too low/loud, how can I adjust the speaker volume? A: All you need to do is to adjust the volume of the media player and computer system. Q: What's the problem if the speaker still “Doesn't Work” after plugged in? A1: Make sure that the USB port of your computer can work properly. A2: Make sure that you had selected "USB2.0 Device" as your computer sound output device. Q: Is there a built-in microphone? A: No. There is no built-in mic, so it is recommended to use a separate computer microphone when having video calls.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the LIELONGREN [Newer] USB Computer Speakers for my desktop, and I couldn't be happier with my choice. These speakers have truly enhanced my audio experience while using my computer, and here's why they deserve a positive review.First and foremost, the setup was a breeze. These speakers connect via USB, eliminating the need for an additional power source or complex wiring. Plug and play simplicity meant that I was enjoying my improved audio quality within seconds.The sound quality these speakers deliver is impressive for their compact size. They produce clear and crisp audio with a surprising amount of depth and volume. Whether I'm listening to music, watching videos, or participating in video conferences, the audio is a noticeable upgrade from my computer's built-in speakers.The sleek and minimalist design of these speakers is another plus. They blend seamlessly into my desktop setup, and their small footprint doesn't clutter my workspace. They're a perfect fit for those looking to maximize their desk space while enjoying superior audio.The convenient volume control knob on one of the speakers adds a level of user-friendliness that I appreciate. It allows me to adjust the volume easily without needing to access my computer's settings.Furthermore, the build quality is solid, and the speakers feel durable and well-constructed. I have confidence that they will continue to perform reliably over time.The LIELONGREN [Newer] USB Computer Speakers have been a fantastic addition to my desktop setup. They offer hassle-free installation, impressive sound quality, and a sleek design. If you're in need of an affordable and effective way to improve your computer's audio, I highly recommend giving these speakers a try. They deliver a noticeable audio upgrade without breaking the bank.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for the price
reviews.reviewText: At this price, don't expect room-filling sound or heavy bass. This is a plug-and-play no-hassle speaker. I have it connected to the USB port on my external monitor and it just works with no setup needed. Sounds good, not great. Definitely outputs fuller sound than most laptops.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Convenient size for desktop computer, adequate sound quality
reviews.reviewText: I had very poor sound from my desktop and this speaker really helps. It's very small and fits well on top of my Mac Mini. I wouldn't recommend it for music, but for news or product videos it is very useful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small size, BIG sound (LLR055)
reviews.reviewText: For the price this thing is a beast. To start, there is no distortion at even the highest volume. The sound is clear and crisp. Nuances come out very well. The speaker is a bit lacking at the lowest end, but not enough that it ruins the mix. The size is fairly small, great for just tossing it into a bag/case, and going., you don’t even need an external power source. I hoked it to my iPad Pro, and it just worked. It’s loud enough for small parties, and if you DJ, this could do the job for small venues. It literally is “Plug and Play”, just plug it in, select the right audio source, and there you have it. The volume and mute buttons are useful, and very convenient to have. One thing I think it could do better, is to have a jack for a cable, instead of a non-replaceable one, but for the price, that may not be a big concern. All in all, this little guy has outperformed every expectation I had from it, and I would buy it again, and recommend it to my social circle, in a heartbeat, and a very nice sounding one at that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Audio cuts off randomly on my desktop (could be my USB issue), works fine on my laptop
reviews.reviewText: 4th: To be fair, something might be wrong with my desktop computer's USB ports. When I connect my phone to my computer through USB, it often shuts down randomly. I tested the speaker before using my laptop and it worked (20 mins of testing). But this is a tricky issue to find since my mouse, keyboard, printers, etc, are all functional. Due to this user issue, I will increase my rating to a 3/5 since I tried different USB ports on my desktop and it still doesn't work well and the audio does occasionally cuts like half a second during my laptop testing. I have already returned this product thru Amazon and have ordered another speaker that uses the 3.5mm audio jack.3rd Update: Connecting the USB to the front did not fix the issue. I don't use my laptop often so this speaker is no longer needed. I tried contacting their support for help (edit: they did respond back on Feb 28) but I am still waiting for their response. I contacted Amazon support and will be returning this product.2nd Update: I connected the USB to the front slots of my desktop and it seemed to have alleviated the issue. Will keep this updated if anything changes. I like the sound quality and the power it gives. The manufacturer does include an 18-month warranty but hopefully I won’t have to use it.Update: Works on my laptop, audio cuts off on my older desktopWhen I plugged this speaker into my Dell desktop and played a 15 minute song, not ten minutes later, the sound stopped playing. I did some troubleshooting and found that other apps that require sound also malfunctioned, like YouTube videos. I tried updating my device drivers, restarting, disabling audio enchantments, and looked for help online. The only way for me to continue with the song is to manually pause or stop it and then play it again. My desktop is about ten years old but my USB is 2.0. I had the same issue with another mouse that worked only intermittently so the issue could be with my USB ports or drivers due to its age (but my Logitech mouse worked perfectly fine).I also tested this on my 2018 or so HP laptop and it worked. I played the same 15 minute clip and it played it all the way. The only thing I’ve noticed is from time to time, the audio would cut off briefly for half a second or so and then continue playing again. I find it odd but then when I touched my laptop with static electricity the same phenomenon would happen. I used the VLC media player for both tests.Other then that, the sound quality and power is good. The speaker is powerful for its size. For stability, I would prefer getting audio speakers that does NOT use USB for either sound input or power and rely on the tried-but-true 3.5mm audio jack and AC power from the outlet.Received and used this speaker right away. I'm using this on my desktop computer and the cord is sufficiently long enough to each the back of my USB port. Installation is simple, plug and play. Volume up and down buttons modify Windows volume. I like how just one cable provides both the audio AND sound. At 8 watts, this speaker is overpowered for its size. At 60% volume it is enough to fill my large room. The sound quality is good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sound quality and volume for such a small speaker at a low price!
reviews.reviewText: Speaker is convenient to hook up with just a USB cable to sound and power. The sound quality and volume for such a small and low-cost speaker is excellent. I've purchased several for people at work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I wanted.
reviews.reviewText: This is just what I expected and it does an excellent job. Took me less than 5 minutes to have it working. No bright lights to distract me and a nice clear sound.

reviews.reviewTitle: Good clarity, no background frequency noise
reviews.reviewText: I wasn't sure how good these speakers would be, but they are decent! They don't go super loud or have super bass, but there is no background distortion noise that some USB speakers have, and the clarity is really good for speakers of this size.Want some basic compact and decent-sounding speakers? These are it! That said, if you want gaming or party speakers, you'll need to invest more money.
Fácil de usar, não precisa de driver. Plug&Play

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 3, 2021
reviews.reviewText: A good quality speaker with a small footprint but has very reasonable sound quality for its size. Its robust and well finished with good volume control buttons( + and -) and a very useful mute button. Plays everything well without any noticeable distortion. Good value for money

the speaker was smaller than I expected whci was great for my limited space. The sound has been perfect for my language lessons - clear and precise. So easy to instal - just plugs in and its ready to goImpressive value.

reviews.reviewTitle: イヤホーンよりいいな。
reviews.reviewText: 今までずっとイヤホーンで聴いていたが、あまり長時間使用すると難聴になるといわれて、これを使ってみた。音楽を聴くとき以外はこれがいいと思う。ただ、あまり大きな音は出ない。
